pragma solidity 0.4.24;

contract Unique {

    function uniquify(uint[] input) public pure returns(uint[] ret) {
        uint len = input.length;
        if (len <= 1) {
            return input;
        }
        uint lenny = 11 * len / 7;
        lenny = lenny % 2 == 0 ? lenny + 1 : lenny;

        uint ptr;
        uint value;
        uint valueMod;
        uint tempRet;
        uint i;
        ret = new uint[](lenny);

        // loop while i == ptr
        for(; i == ptr && i < len; i++) {
            value = valueMod = input[i] + 1;
            while(true) {
                valueMod %= lenny;
                tempRet = ret[valueMod];
                if (tempRet == value) break;
                if (tempRet == 0) {
                    ret[valueMod] = value;
                    ptr++;
                    break;
                }
                valueMod+=9973;
            }
        }

        if (ptr == len) {
            return input;
        }

        // new loop once i != ptr
        for(; i < len; i++) {
            value = valueMod = input[i] + 1;
            while(true) {
                valueMod %= lenny;
                tempRet = ret[valueMod];
                if (tempRet == value) break;
                if (tempRet == 0) {
                    ret[valueMod] = value;
                    input[ptr] = value - 1;
                    ptr++;
                    break;
                }
                valueMod+=9973;
            }
        }

        ret = new uint[](ptr);

        for(i = 0; i < ptr; i++) {
            ret[i] = input[i];
        }

        return ret;
    }

}
